text: Belle-et-Houllefort is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts- de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A farming and quarrying commune, some northeast of Boulogne, at the junction of the N42, D233 and the D238 roads and by the banks of the river Wimereux. ==Population== ==Sights== * The ruins of a fortified house. * The church at Belle, dating from the twelfth century. * The church at Houllefort, dating from the seventeenth century. * The sixteenth century manorhouse du Major. * The Hôtel-de-ville, built in 1862. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Belle-et-Houllefort
